results.title: Amiodarone-induced neurotoxicity.
results.text_hl: Physical examination of the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ revealed @<m>DISEASE_Cerebellar_Ataxia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002524 @@@finger-to-nose dysmetria@@@, @DISEASE_Gait_Disorders_Neurologic @DISEASE_MESH:D020233 @@@unsteady gait@@@ with leftward prevalence, positive Romberg's sign, and inability to perform heel-to-toe walk.

citations.NLM: Willis MS, Lugo AM. Amiodarone-induced neurotoxicity. Am J Health Syst Pharm. 2009 Mar 15;66(6):567-9. PMID: 19265185
